decode.description: Decodes a provided DarkestDungeon save file into a JSON file
decode.longDescription: Decodes a provided DarkestDungeon save file into a JSON file
decode.afterHelp:
you can run the command with ./app decode [--names, -n <namefile>] [--output, -o <outfile>] filename
where:
<namefile> is the txt cache of names
<outfile> is the path of the output file
filename is the file to decode

encode.description: Encodes a provided JSON file into a DarkestDungeon save file
encode.longDescription: Encodes a provided JSON file into a DarkestDungeon save file
encode.afterHelp:
you can run the command with ./app encode [--output, -o <outfile>] filename
where:
<outfile> is the path of the output file
filename is the file to decode

names.description: Generates a txt file containing the names of DarkestDungeon save file fields
names.longDescription: Generates a txt file containing the names of DarkestDungeon save file fields
names.afterHelp:
you can run the command with ./app names [--output, -o <outfile>] [...dirs]
where:
<outfile> is the path of the output file
[..dirs] is a space sperated list of directories containing game data
